de.wirecard.epos

Interface UserManager


  • public UserManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Completable changePassword() 
      io.reactivex.Completable changePassword()
      Functionality to change password of user on backend and also the password which is set in SDK. After successful change, this method will automatically call Other.updateUserCredentials.
      io.reactivex.Completable changePassword()
      Functionality to change password of user on backend and also the password which is set in SDK. After successful change, this method will automatically call Other.updateUserCredentials.
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword() 
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword()
      Request backend that user forgot password to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword() 
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword()
      Request backend that user forgot password to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword()
      Request backend that user forgot password to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotPassword()
      Request backend that user forgot password to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotUserId() 
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotUserId()
      Request backend that user forgot userId to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Completable forgotUserId()
      Request backend that user forgot userId to perform actions
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.user.User> getCurrentUser() 
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.user.User> getCurrentUser()
      Checks if user exists on backend. If user exists method provides whole User object with all information about it. Credentials for user are set in SDK initialization or it can be set also in Other.updateUserCredentials
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.user.User> getCurrentUser()
      Checks if user exists on backend. If user exists method provides whole User object with all information about it. Credentials for user are set in SDK initialization or it can be set also in Other.updateUserCredentials
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.security.PasswordPolicy> getPasswordPolicy() 
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.security.PasswordPolicy> getPasswordPolicy()
      Returns PasswordPolicy object which contains all requirements and restrictions for password.
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.security.PasswordPolicy> getPasswordPolicy()
      Returns PasswordPolicy object which contains all requirements and restrictions for password.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentUser

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.user.User> getCurrentUser()
        See Also:
        UserManager.getCurrentUser

      • getCurrentUser

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.user.User> getCurrentUser()

        Checks if user exists on backend. If user exists method provides whole User object with all information about it. Credentials for user are set in SDK initialization or it can be set also in Other.updateUserCredentials

        See Also:
        Other.updateUserCredentials

      • changePassword

        io.reactivex.Completable changePassword()
        See Also:
        UserManager.changePassword

      • changePassword

        io.reactivex.Completable changePassword()

        Functionality to change password of user on backend and also the password which is set in SDK. After successful change, this method will automatically call Other.updateUserCredentials.

        See Also:
        Other.updateUserCredentials

      • getPasswordPolicy

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.security.PasswordPolicy> getPasswordPolicy()
        See Also:
        UserManager.getPasswordPolicy

      • getPasswordPolicy

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.security.PasswordPolicy> getPasswordPolicy()

        Returns PasswordPolicy object which contains all requirements and restrictions for password.

        See Also:
